item.title: Is know how to search on Google a skill?
item.description: Most of us do search on Google every day, maybe looking for a website, for news, for an address, for a cooking recipe, for information about a topic we are interested in, for technical information or anything. All developers I know use Google, another search engine, or search on webpages like stack overflow every day to find the best way to do a task. So is it a skill?, Should you know how to resolve a task without using Google or another knowledge source?
